name: 112.chat-app
description: Chat using Typescript, NextJS, Socket IO

scripts.dev: npm run dev --prefix server & npm run dev --prefix client
scripts.install: npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client
scripts.build: npm run build-server --prefix client && npm run build --prefix server
scripts.ghupdate: git add . && echo "Enter commit message" && read message && git commit -m "$message" && git push
